Posts.Content: May 23, 2012 11:06AM worriedhusband wrote: OK here it is. I talked to the doctor and she said there were no cancer cells found in the biopsy. The smaller lump was a fibroadenoma. The bigger lump could be either a fibroadenoma or Phyllodes tumor. Considering Phyllodes makes up 1% of all breast cancers I'm feeling really good about her chances. She'll be scheduled to meet with a breast specialist soon. As for the delay she just said their radiology department was brand new and that they were still working out the kinks. Still praying for the best.
